budgetID.description: Primary key for the budget entry, auto-incremented

userID.description: Reference to the User collection (foreign key)

name.description: Name of the budget, maximum length of 255 characters

totalAmount.description: Total allocated amount for the budget

spentAmount.description: Amount already spent from the budget

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the budget entry was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the budget entry was last updated
